About the Person

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

Hi, I'm Ferran. I hope we can be useful to each other. That is the idea

Most of what I am, relates to my childhood. See how.

Spanish

That was an accident, but a happy one. I'm 59 years old and counting. I've lived most of my life in countries other than Spain. Still, I call it home.

Musician

As a kid I had this dream: To be a professional violinist. It was very hard, but I did get it. A job in a professional orchestra and a teaching position on the local Music Conservatory

IT professional

As a kid I did not know what computers were. When I discover what you could do to or with them, I was hooked. It was the magic of, through programing them, they would bring to life something that did not exist before...

Father

As a kid I had this dream: to have three daughters. It was hard to get it, but we succeeded

Being a father is the easiest thing to be. Being a good one, it's a different matter. I keep trying.

Friend

They say that friends are everything

I have few and far between of them, mostly due to me moving so much, but they are precious to me and I'm a bedrock to them. They can and do count on me

Curious

Being curious is something I can't help
